SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 66Buy limit: 2000Examine: 1 dose of super Strength potion.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Super strengthImage: File:Super strength(1).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.020Value: 110Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 27 February 2002Item ID: 161

A super strength is a potion made by using a limpwurt root on a kwuarm potion (unf), requiring 55 Herblore, yielding a super strength(3) and 125 Herblore experience. A dose of super strength provides a temporary skill boost to Strength equal to 5 + 15% of the player's current Strength level, rounded down.

Super strength are popular along with super attacks for player killing, bossing, Slayer, or melee training. The dragon battleaxe special may be preferable for melee training because it provides a similar boost, but is much cheaper in the long run.

Crystal dust may be added to super strength, 1 dust per dose of potion, to make a divine super strength potion, requiring 70 Herblore.

A super strength(4), super attack(4), super defence(4), and a torstol can be combined to make a super combat potion, requiring 90 Herblore.

After Barbarian Herblore Training, caviar can be added to a super strength(2), requiring 59 Herblore, yielding a super str. mix and 42 Herblore experience. A super str. mix has 2 doses, boosts Strength equal to 5 + 15% of the player's current Strength level, rounded down, and heals 6 Hitpoints. Additionally, it can be upgraded to a super combat potion by adding a super attack potion, a super defence potion, and a torstol with 90 Herblore.

A super strength(4) is a reward from Jekyll and Hyde random events if a snapdragon is given to Dr. Jekyll.

Effects[edit | edit source]

Strength boost is calculated with: ⌊ S t r e n g t h L e v e l × 15 100 ⌋ + 5 {\displaystyle \lfloor StrengthLevel\times {\frac {15}{100}}\rfloor +5}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-6 +5 34-39 +10 67-73 +15
7-13 +6 40-46 +11 74-79 +16
14-19 +7 47-53 +12 80-86 +17
20-26 +8 54-59 +13 87-93 +18
27-33 +9 60-66 +14 94-99 +19

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
15 April 2016
(update)

Half full potions could now be turned into bank placeholders.

14 August 2014
(update | poll)

Super strength(4) may now be used as a component to make Super combat potion.

29 March 2004
(update)

The 4 dose potion became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

9 March 2004
(update)

The 4 dose potion was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

A '''super strength''' is a [[Herblore#Potions|potion]] made by using a [[limpwurt root]] on a [[kwuarm potion (unf)]], requiring 55 [[Herblore]], yielding a super strength(3) and 125 Herblore [[experience]]. A dose of super strength provides a [[temporary skill boost]] to [[Strength]] equal to 5 + 15% of the player's current Strength level, rounded down.

Super strength are popular along with [[super attack]]s for [[player killing]], [[bossing]], [[Slayer]], or [[Pay-to-play melee training|melee training]]. The [[dragon battleaxe]] special may be preferable for melee training because it provides a similar boost, but is much cheaper in the long run.

Crystal dust may be added to super strength, 1 dust per dose of potion, to make a [[divine super strength potion]], requiring 70 Herblore.

A super strength(4), [[super attack(4)]], [[super defence(4)]], and a [[torstol]] can be combined to make a [[super combat potion]], requiring 90 Herblore.

After [[Barbarian Training#Barbarian Herblore|Barbarian Herblore Training]], [[caviar]] can be added to a super strength(2), requiring 59 Herblore, yielding a [[super str. mix]] and 42 Herblore experience. A super str. mix has 2 doses, boosts Strength equal to 5 + 15% of the player's current Strength level, rounded down, and heals 6 [[Hitpoints]]. Additionally, it can be upgraded to a [[super combat potion]] by adding a [[super attack potion]], a [[super defence potion]], and a [[torstol]] with 90 Herblore.

A super strength(4) is a reward from [[Jekyll and Hyde]] [[random event]]s if a [[snapdragon]] is given to Dr. Jekyll.
